```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)
```


```{r}
aridity <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_aridity.tif"))
temp <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_temp.tif"))
landforms <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_landforms.tif"))
landcover <- raster(here("sb_layers","sb_landcover.tif"))

```

```{r}
# relabeling landforms raster. 

plot(landforms)
unique(landforms)

thresh<- matrix(c(26,1,
                  27,2,
                  31,3,
                  32,4), nrow=4,byrow=TRUE)
landforms <- reclassify(landforms,thresh) 

unique(landforms)
plot(landforms)
```
